entry.title: Bringing back the golden days of Bell Labs
entry.quote: Bell Labs produced both fundamental breakthroughs that changed our understanding of the Universe and technological advances that have shaped the modern world.

entry.title: MIT invents $4 solar desalination device
entry.quote: Researchers from MIT and China have developed a solar desalination device that could provide a family of four with all the drinking water it needs — and it can be made from just $4 worth of materials.

entry.title: Why Is the Human Brain So Efficient?
entry.quote: How massive parallelism lifts the brain’s performance above that of AI.

entry.title: Building a Next-Level Camera
entry.quote: Can this old lens become legendary? I think it can!

entry.title: Experimenting Can Lead to Great Dataviz
entry.quote: Developing an interactive visualization from scratch in seven days: a step-by-step process
